ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 13:10:55. [Issue ID 191313]
ComicInfo.Title: Hero of the Confederacy part 3 of 3
ComicInfo.Summary: Anakin Skywalker is recalled to active duty to deal with a Separatist pilot who has been wreaking havoc on the Republic's fleets. But Anakin's chance to prove himself comes at a high price: the enemy ace is a friend. The costs of war have never been higher, and even Obi-Wan Kenobi's desperate attempts to find a path to peace may come too late.
ComicInfo.Characters: Count Dooku,Asajj Ventress,Darth Vader,Saesee Tiin,Ahsoka Tano,Obi-Wan Kenobi,Qui-Gon Jinn,Admiral Wullf Yularen,Tofen Vane,Plo Koon,R2-D2,Emperor Palpatine
ComicInfo.Teams: Astromech Droids,The Sith,Rattataki,Kel Dors,Galactic Republic,Togrutas,Iktotchi,Jedi Order,Dark Acolytes,Clone Pilots,Confederacy of Independent Systems
